content:
About Us # “Hell is empty and all the devils are here” - The Tempest
All The Devils Shakespeare is a newly established Saint Augustine non profit that aims to bring classic and Shakespearian works to the public. It is our belief that these stories are timeless and poignant.
All productions will be done free of charge, in the local areas of our community.
UPCOMING AUDITION CALL # Much Ado About Nothing # insert.audition.graphic
